verses.verse: Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> we <WG2248> ought <WG1163> to give the more earnest heed <WG4337> <WG4056> to the things which we have heard, <WG191> lest at any time <WG3379> we should let them slip. <WG3901>

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> spoken <WG2980> by <WG1223> angels <WG32> was <WG1096> steadfast, <WG949> and <WG2532> every <WG3956> transgression <WG3847> and <WG2532> disobedience <WG3876> received <WG2983> a just <WG1738> recompense of reward; <WG3405>

How <WG4459> shall we <WG2249> escape, <WG1628> if we neglect <WG272> so great <WG5082> salvation; <WG4991> which <WG3748> at the first began <WG2983> <WG746> to be spoken <WG2980> by <WG1223> the <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> and <WG2532> was confirmed <WG950> unto <WG1519> us <WG2248> by <WG5259> them that heard <WG191> him;

God <WG2316> also bearing them witness, <WG4901> both <WG5037> with signs <WG4592> and <WG2532> wonders, <WG5059> and <WG2532> with divers <WG4164> miracles, <WG1411> and <WG2532> gifts <WG3311> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost, <WG4151> according <WG2596> to his own <WG848> will? <WG2308>
For <WG1063> unto the angels <WG32> hath he not <WG3756> put in subjection <WG5293> the <WG3588> world <WG3625> to come, <WG3195> whereof <WG4012> <WG3739> we speak. <WG2980>

But <WG1161> one <WG5100> in a certain place <WG4225> testified, <WG1263> saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> is <WG2076> man, <WG444> that <WG3754> thou art mindful <WG3403> of him? <WG846> or <WG2228> the son <WG5207> of man, <WG444> that <WG3754> thou visitest <WG1980> him? <WG846>

Thou madest <WG1642> him <WG846> a little lower <WG5100> <WG1024> than <WG3844> the angels; <WG32> thou crownedst <WG4737> him <WG846> with glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> honor, <WG5092> and <WG2532> didst set <WG2525> him <WG846> over <WG1909> the <WG3588> works <WG2041> of thy <WG4675> hands: <WG5495>

Thou hast put all things in subjection <WG5293> <WG3956> under <WG5270> his <WG846> feet. <WG4228> For <WG1063> in that he put all in subjection under <WG5293> <WG3956> him, <WG846> he left <WG863> nothing <WG3762> that is not put under <WG506> him. <WG846> But <WG1161> now <WG3568> we see <WG3708> not yet <WG3768> all things <WG3956> put under <WG5293> him. <WG846>

But <WG1161> we see <WG991> Jesus, <WG2424> who was made a little lower <WG1642> <WG1024> <WG5100> than <WG3844> the angels <WG32> for <WG1223> the <WG3588> suffering <WG3804> of death, <WG2288> crowned <WG4737> with glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> honor; <WG5092> that <WG3704> he by the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> should taste <WG1089> death <WG2288> for <WG5228> every man. <WG3956>

For <WG1063> it became <WG4241> him, <WG846> for <WG1223> whom <WG3739> are all things, <WG3956> and <WG2532> by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> are all things, <WG3956> in bringing <WG71> many <WG4183> sons <WG5207> unto <WG1519> glory, <WG1391> to make the captain of their salvation perfect <WG5048> <WG3588> <WG747> <WG846> <WG4991> through <WG1223> sufferings. <WG3804>

For <WG1063> both <WG5037> he that sanctifieth <WG37> and <WG2532> they who are sanctified <WG37> are all <WG3956> of <WG1537> one: <WG1520> for <WG1223> which <WG3739> cause <WG156> he is not <WG3756> ashamed <WG1870> to call <WG2564> them <WG846> brethren, <WG80>

saying, <WG3004> I will declare <WG518> thy <WG4675> name <WG3686> unto my <WG3450> brethren, <WG80> in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of the church <WG1577> will I sing praise <WG5214> unto thee. <WG4571>

And <WG2532> again, <WG3825> I <WG1473> will put my trust <WG2071> <WG3982> in <WG1909> him. <WG846> And <WG2532> again, <WG3825> Behold <WG2400> I <WG1473> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> children <WG3813> which <WG3739> God <WG2316> hath given <WG1325> me. <WG3427>

Forasmuch <WG1893> then <WG3767> as the <WG3588> children <WG3813> are partakers <WG2841> of flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> blood, <WG129> he <WG846> also <WG2532> himself likewise <WG3898> took part <WG3348> of the <WG3588> same; <WG846> that <WG2443> through <WG1223> death <WG2288> he might destroy <WG2673> him that had <WG2192> the <WG3588> power <WG2904> of death, <WG2288> that is, <WG5123> the <WG3588> devil; <WG1228>
And <WG2532> deliver <WG525> them <WG5128> who <WG3745> through fear <WG5401> of death <WG2288> were <WG2258> all <WG3956> their <WG1223> lifetime <WG2198> subject to <WG1777> bondage. <WG1397>
For <WG1063> verily <WG1222> he took not on <WG1949> <WG3756> him the nature of angels; <WG32> but <WG235> he took on <WG1949> him the seed <WG4690> of Abraham. <WG11>

Wherefore <WG3606> in <WG2596> all things <WG3956> it behooved <WG3784> him to be made like unto <WG3666> his brethren, <WG80> that <WG2443> he might be <WG1096> a merciful <WG1655> and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> high priest <WG749> in things <WG4314> pertaining to God, <WG2316> to make reconciliation for <WG2433> the <WG3588> sins <WG266> of the <WG3588> people. <WG2992>
For <WG1063> in <WG1722> that <WG3739> he <WG846> himself hath suffered <WG3958> being tempted, <WG3985> he is able <WG1410> to succor <WG997> them that are tempted. <WG3985>
